metadata.title: CVE-2022-29912 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Requests initiated through reader mode did not properly omit cookies with aSameSite attribute. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.9, FirefoxESR < 91.9, and Firefox < 100.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29912` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:91.9.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
